name: The Maze Runner (itch) (pakistaniboy, Bold Aesthetic Creative)
name_original: The Maze Runner (itch) (pakistaniboy, Bold Aesthetic Creative)
description: it's a game that will get difficult extremely fast, just like Temple Run and Jetpack Joyride, and it's specifically created to keep you on your toes. You basically control a character that runs along the  tracks and tries not to get hit by any moving or stationary obstacle.
